text:
滑らかで艶があり、型崩れもし難く色褪せもしない魔絹織物のハンカチなら、貴族の皆様でも喜ばれるだろうしね。
ただまぁ、そこは貴族社会。
商人から刺繍用の素材として買うのならともかく、これでも一応は貴族の令嬢なので、そのままハンカチ程度の物を贈ると言うのは世間が許してくれない。
仕方ないので、貴族社会の風習に倣って刺繍を施していると言う訳です。
trans:
Smooth, shiny, and never to lose either its shape or color, the enchanted silk handkerchiefs are sure to amaze even the nobles.
That said, this is high society we're talking about.
Although the merchant may keep and sell such fabric appropriately as embroidery material, such being the case, when I myself am a noble person, a mere handkerchief without any form of elaboration is not fitting and proper to give away.
So, in keeping with noble customs, I’ve been adding embroidery to them.
